form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION OF ALLEGED AMERICAN CITIZEN OF THE CHINESE RACE FOR PRE-VESTIGATION OF STATUS, Form 430

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 Form 430 APPLICATION OF ALLEGED AMERICAN CITIZEN OF THE CHINESE RACE FOR PREINVESTIGATION OF STATUS ORIGINAL. it SPHO2 No .8402/196 U. S. DEPARTMENT OF LABOR DD 4402/157 IMMIGRATION SERVICE Los Angeles, Calif. July 11, 1933 9 192 To Judson F. Shaw, Officer in Charge, Immigration Service, Los Angeles, Calif. SIR: It being my intention to leave the United States on a tem- Age , 15 Height 5 ft 5 in. porary visit abroad, departing and returning through the Chinese (In shoes) Marks Pit on tip of nose. port of entry of San Pedro, Calif. , I hereby apply, under the provisions of Rule 16 of the Chinese Regulations, Scar left temple in hair. for preinvestigation of my claimed status as an American citizen, submitting herewith such documentary proofs (if any) as I possess, and agreeing to appear at such time and place as you may designate, and to produce then and there witnesses for oral examination regard- ing the claim made by me. This application is submitted in triplicate with my photograph attached to each copy, as required by said rule. Respectfully, Signature in Chinese #1584 (WONG GO CK ON) Signature in English Address Vermont Ave. Io S Angeles. iii 1 my # FH 191 2H I PORT OF Los Angeles, California, July 29, 1933. , 192 This is to certify that the person of Chinese descent named herein, and whose photograph is attached, under the signature of the investigating officer and under my signature and seal to the above application, has filed in my office the duplicate of this application and evidence in corroboration of his claimed American citizenship. Upon his return to this port and his identification as the person to whom this paper thus approved is delivered, he will be permitted to reenter the United States unless pending such return it has been found that his claim is false. SAN PEDRO, CALIF 1 Departed AUG 201553 PRES. LINCOLN Harry B. Blee Xss Yohyen Thomagration, Burrilson GOVERNMENT X PRINTING OFFICE Asst. District Director of Immigration Los Angeles District. R
